DOC.brief_title: Effect Dietary Fat When Eaten With Fructose Versus Glucose
DOC.detailed_description: After 2 screen visit include exercise test , DEXA CT scan , qualifier begin 7 day diet 20 % fat , 65 % carbohydrate ( 20 % glucose ) 15 % protein . Participants consume 2 meal per day PBRC lunch weekend meal pack go . Following test day , participant randomize one 3 diet assignment test : 1 ) 20 % fat , 65 % carbohydrate ( 20 % glucose beverage ) , 15 % protein 2 ) 40 % fat , 45 % carbohydrate ( 20 % glucose beverage ) , 15 % protein 3 ) 40 % fat , 45 % carbohydrate ( 20 % fructose beverage ) , 15 % protein On Day 7 14 day later participant lab , oral Glucose tolerance test , hepatic intramuscular lipid measure MRS , vital sign waist measurement .
DOC.criteria: BMI 25 35 kg/m2 inclusive At least one following : 1 . Impaired fast glucose 100125 mg/dl inclusive 2 . HDL 40 mg/dl men 50 mg/dl female 3 . Triglycerides 150 mg/dl 400 mg/dl inclusive 4 . Blood pressure equal 135 / 85 mm Hg Waist circumference > 94cm ( 37 inch ) men > 80cm woman Mainly Healthy Unable unlikely eat study food food provide PRBC Taking routine medication except birth control pill Smoke , Abuse drug , Alcohol Pregnant breastfeeding , irregular menstrual cycle , Postmenopausal , PCOS Diabetes , heart , lung , liver , blood , Kidney disease
